column2: I was going to Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba at least once a week. The food was on point and the presentation made it stand out! However
column3: after becoming much more commercialized over the last couple of years
column4: the food authenticity and selection has become something similar to chain restaurant quality. The last time I visited was for my birthday
column6: a waiter crashed into my guest's chair and the entire tray of food came barreling down on her and her belongings. It was awful. They gave us coupons for our next visit. Not impressed and haven't been back since :/
